hints.content:
$\greenD{?}-\goldE{47} = \purpleD{772}$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point question mark back to point 772 is labeled, minus 47.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/aa3ef2290ebbe6e5aa3ca55a8eb85cd3cbf25934)

What number can we subtract $\goldE{47}$ from and be left with $\purpleD{772}?$

We can add $\goldE{47}$ to $\purpleD{772}$ to find the missing number.

$\begin{align}\goldE{47}&\\
\underline{+ \purpleD{772}} &\\
\greenD{819}&\end{align}$

![The same number line as above, with the question mark replaced with 819 and an arrow from 772 to 819 labeled plus 47](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6f14a3f92c50da918823f870976d9f905a868870)

question.content:
**What number makes this equation true?**

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] ${} - 47 = 772$
